description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNEWNET-39332	Set TOC elements line dash style as None
PDFNEWNET-36318	Remove the XFA data structure from dynamic PDF Forms
PDFNEWNET-33623	Convert XML/XSL to PDF - Formatting issue

Enhancements
PDFNEWNET-37507	Alternative of WrapLines in new Generator
PDFNEWNET-36022	How to calculate text index from TextFragment item

Execeptions
PDFNEWNET-36105	XFA to AcroForm conversion
PDFNEWNET-35174	SVG to PDF - Exception when loading SVG from Stream object
PDFNET-41128	IndexOutOfRangeException during PDF/A-1a conversion
PDFNEWNET-40327	API throws intermittently NullReferenceException in multiprocessing of PDF to HTML conersion
PDFNEWNET-38187	XPS to PDF: conversion throws Argument exception
PDFNEWNET-35993	Dynamic XFA form conversion to Static/Standard throws NotImplementedException

Bugs
PDFNEWNET-40336	PDF to PDFA1a: conversion works fine with 10.9.0 but 11.3.0
PDFNET-41286	PDF to HTML: text rendering incorrectly
PDFNEWNET-36810	PDF to TEX - conversion takes too much time

PDFNEWNET-38878	PDF to PNG - resultant image is not correct
PDFNET-41243	HTML to PDF - Conversion process hangs
PDFNET-41058	Invisible text on the right from the redactArea becomes visible
PDFNEWNET-39945	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not PDF/A_1b compliant
PDFNEWNET-39289	PDF to JPEG - Some symbols look like different in resultant file
PDFNEWNET-37787	PDF to TIFF - Data from one of the layers is missing
PDFNEWNET-36486	HTML to PDF - Formatting issues when converting web page to PDF
PDFNEWNET-36422	PCL to PDF - Resultant file having special control characters
PDFNEWNET-35935	SVG to PDF - resultant document does not retain vector graphics
PDFNEWNET-35502	Problem converting static XFA document to standard PDF
PDFNEWNET-35254	PDF to HTML - hyperlinks are removed
PDFNEWNET-35015	PDF to HTML :- Formatting issues
PDFNET-41093	PDF to HTML - Text and graphics are missing from resultant file
PDFNEWNET-40900	PDF to HTML: incorrect text rendering
PDFNEWNET-40892	PDF to HTML: underline render as strike through line
PDFNEWNET-40318	Html to PDF: text overlaps in resultant PDF
PDFNEWNET-40220	PDF to PDFA1b: transparent image background changes to black
PDFNEWNET-38821	PDF to HTML with embedded resoureces throws OutOfMemory exception
PDFNEWNET-37843	PDF to HTML: equations text is jumbled in output HTML pages.
PDFNEWNET-37331	MHT to PDF: formatting in output PDF file is incorrect
PDFNEWNET-36531	PCL to PDF: empty file is being generated
PDFNET-41410	Stream is disposed after document loading
PDFNET-41369	Table header cell background color issue with Colspan and TableBroken property
PDFNET-41206	TextFragmentAbsorber replaces blue color with red
PDFNET-41166	CheckBoxField border issue
PDFNET-41106	AutoFittoContent property of ColumnAdjustment of Table issue
PDFNET-41080	PDF to PDFA: incorrect PDF orientation
PDFNEWNET-39055	PDF to EPUB: Output is not working on a mobile devices
PDFNET-41522 HtmlFragment render same HTML text differently in a PDF document
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
